name: Web Development
description: Full-stack web applications built with modern technologies like React, Node.js, and cloud-native architectures. We create scalable, secure, and performance-optimized solutions.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Native iOS and Android applications, plus cross-platform solutions using React Native and Flutter. From concept to app store deployment.

name: E-commerce Solutions
description: Complete online store platforms with advanced features for B2B and B2C businesses. Custom e-commerce solutions that drive conversion and growth.

name: Digital Transformation
description: Comprehensive digital strategy and implementation services to modernize business processes, improve efficiency, and accelerate growth.

name: UI/UX Design
description: User-centered design that creates intuitive, engaging, and accessible digital experiences. From research and wireframing to high-fidelity prototypes.

name: Cloud Solutions
description: Scalable cloud infrastructure, DevOps automation, and migration services. Expertise in AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud for optimal performance and cost efficiency.
